text: Nihsandeha phira'aunale dharatima atteripana gardai a'eko thiyo ra tyahamka manisaharula'i aneka samuhama vibhajana gari e'uta samuhala'i kamajora parisakeko thiyo. Tyasale uniharuka choraharula'i maridinthyo ra uniharuka choriharula'i jivita rahana dinthyo niscaya nai tyo upadrava garneharumadhyeko thiyo
